home.step2: Isinyathelo 2: Faka incazelo bese unamathisela isithombe sodoti.
home.step3: Isinyathelo 3: Chofoza Thumela Isithombe. Usuke wenze ingxenye yakho yokugcina iplanethi ihlanzekile!

communityDropdown.errorUnableToRetrieve: Ayikwazanga ukuthola indawo yakho. Sicela ufake ngezandla.

faqs.question: Ungabika kanjani ukulahleka kwamadoti?
faqs.answer: Ungabika isenzakalo sokulahleka kwamadoti ngokuvakashela ikhasi le 'Bika' kuDumpWatch.

faqs.question: Kwenzakalani ngemva kokuthi ngibhale umbiko?
faqs.answer: Uma usubikile, uzotholakala ezinhlelweni zendawo kanye nabantu bomphakathi ukuze babuke, babambe iqhaza futhi basebenze.

faqs.question: Ubani ongabona imibhalo yami nempendulo?
faqs.answer: Imibhalo nempendulo zakho zibonakala kuwo wonke amalungu omphakathi okhethiwe, kanye nanoma yimuphi umsebenzisi obhalisiwe.

faqs.question: Ngingasusa yini imibhalo nempendulo yami?
faqs.answer: Cha, ikhono lokususa imibhalo nempendulo lizokwethulwa esikhathini esizayo.

faqs.question: Ngihlangabezane nenkinga nenkqubo, ngingaxhumana kanjani nenkxaso?
faqs.answer: Noma yiziphi izimpendulo noma imibuzo ziyakwaziswa kakhulu futhi zingathunyelwa ethimeni lethu lenkxaso nge-imeyili.

funFacts: Umthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika uvikela wonke umuntu ilungelo lokufinyelela endaweni engalimazi impilo yabo.
INingizimu Afrika yakhiqiza ama-tonne angu-108 wemfucuza ngo-2011, kanti ama-tonne angu-59 ayefucuza jikelele.
Ukuphinda kusetshenziswe itheyili elilodwa le-aluminium kuhlangabezana namandla okusebenzisa ilambu le-100-watt amahora angu-20.

articles.title: Yini ukulahleka kwamadoti?
articles.description: Ukulahleka kwamadoti kusho ukulahla imfucuza endaweni yomphakathi ngaphandle kwemvume, okulimaza imvelo nempilo yomphakathi.

articles.title: Ukulahleka kwamadoti akugcini nje ngokubukeka kabi kodwa kuyingozi futhi
articles.description: Ukulahleka kwamadoti eNingizimu Afrika kubiza ama-R350 million njalo ngonyaka ukukhipha ama-tonne angu-180,000 wemfucuza.
